body.body: Oh hey, you again!  That party was pretty fun, huh?  You want in on this one?  Well, it's BYOB, so you better run down to the store over there and grab a pack.
Oh... that road's quite a stretch there, and bums like to hang out over there.  Take these beers and drink 'em, they'll increase your speed and... manueverability, haha!  Good luck!
Better pick up at least _beersToWin... we'll need some for flipcup too!
